content.rendered:
Reading Time: 3 minutes

Our Story

The Hollywood Gossip is the leading source of celebrity news for anyone who loves Hollywood gossip, scandals, and breaking news on their favorite stars. We are dedicated to working around the clock to inform and entertain our readers with updates on the biggest celebrities in the world.

Founded in 2019, The Hollywood Gossip, or THG as we lovingly refer to it, is one of the top independently owned entertainment news sites in the U.S. Originally grown and shaped by the Mediavine founders, visiting THG is like grabbing coffee with your best friend who is obsessed with all things Hollywood. 

Best of all, The Hollywood Gossip is one of a trio of exceptional sites owned by Mediavine, Inc. delivering exceptional coverage in their area of expertise.

For more can’t-miss content, visit our other original sites, Food Fanatic and TV Fanatic.

What We’re All About

We love figuring out what’s going on in the lives of everyone’s favorite stars, recapping the latest episodes of Sister Wives, and taking deep dives into the scandals rocking Hollywood.  We’re all about the gossip, but we’re also committed to getting to the truth. We go the extra mile to find out every detail of a story, comparing information from multiple sources every time we publish, including from the celebrities themselves. 


Bottom line: there’s always going to be unverified information about celebrities flying around. We’re here to find the story, do the research, fact check where we can, and turn around content that’s helpful to you, the fans. We promise to cover all the essential stories you want to read about in your day to day: who is dating who, spoilers from your favorite shows, and clearly define the rumors from the truth on everyone from Taylor Swift to Prince Harry to Jinger Duggar Vuolo.

And just to make sure you don’t miss a beat, subscribe now to get the latest celebrity news, scandals, photos, and quotes before anyone else.

Our Team

The Hollywood Gossip is curated and created by a team of dedicated entertainment journalists who have been covering their beats for years. They’ve interviewed huge stars like Justin Bieber and Charlie Puth, attended red carpet events, and have even published their own novels!

But more importantly, we obsess over all the same things as you: reality tv, new Netflix shows, celebrity breakups, and new music (Taylor’s Version).

Dina Sartore-Bodo, Editor

  • Twitter
  • LinkedIn
  • Link

Dina Sartore-Bodo is a seasoned entertainment journalist with over 15 years of experience in digital journalism, specializing in celebrity lifestyle, award show coverage, and reality television. 

Dina joined the team at The Hollywood Gossip in December 2023, where she continues to combine her passion for entertainment with her keen insight into celebrity culture to produce entertaining and informative content.

Prior to joining THG, Dina held the titles of Managing Editor for HollywoodLife and Executive Editor at PerezHilton.com. She also worked alongside the teams at TV Guide Network and Bauer Publishing. 

Tyler Johnson, Associate Editor

  • Twitter

Tyler Johnson has been a writer and critic for over a decade.

His work has appeared in dozens of publications, including The Buffalo News, Vice, Cracked, and Entertainment Weekly. He self-published his debut novel, Last Call at Santa’s Workshop, in 2023.

Currently, Tyler is the Associate Editor of several websites in the Mediavine family, including TV Fanatic, Food Fanatic, and, of course, The Hollywood Gossip. A graduate of Buffalo State University, he currently resides in Buffalo, New York, with his wife and two cats. In his free time, he enjoys reading, watching movies, cooking, and obsessing over the Buffalo Bills.

Writers
Simon Delott
James Crowley
Kay D. Rhodes

Archived Writers

Amanda Denton

Ally Lewber

Emily Trainham 

Lauren Cox

Paul Dailly

Sarah Taylor 

Advertising

Visit www.mediavine.com for more information.

Copyright Inquiry

If you feel any content on The Hollywood Gossip infringes on your copyright, please contact our designated agent:

copyright@thehollywoodgossip.com
Mediavine Inc.
8 The Green, #20971
Dover, DE 19901
